Name: Walnut Alexander
Ingredients: 7.5 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°Brix)
7.5 ml Egg white (pasteurised) or 																																			Aquafaba (chickpea water)																								 or 3 dashes Fee Brothers Fee Foam cocktail foamer optional
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Martini glass .
SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain back into shaker.
Garnish with dusting of nutmeg grated over cocktail.
Review: One to accompany the nutty chocolates from the after-dinner selection box.
History: Created in 2008 by yours truly at The Cabinet Room, London, England. See our Alexander cocktail page for more information on the origins of the Alexander cocktail .
Nutrition: One serving of Walnut Alexander contains 213 calories
